org.apache.ignite.ml.selection.split.mapper

Interface UniformMapper<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type of a key.
    V - Type of a value.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SHA256UniformMapper
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface UniformMapper<K,V>
extends Serializable
    Interface for util mappers that maps a key-value pair to a point on the segment (0, 1).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double map(K key, V val)
      Maps key-value pair to a point on the segment (0, 1).

    • Method Detail

      • map

        double map(K key,
           V val)
        Maps key-value pair to a point on the segment (0, 1).
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        val - Value.
        Returns:
        Point on the segment (0, 1).
